title: About
text:
This dashboard visualizes publication trends across 120+ countries from the 1970s to 2020s.









Metric
Description




Publications
Country‚Äôs share of global publications


Female Authorship
Percentage of publications with female authors


WEIRD Studies
Studies conducted in Western, Educated, Industrialized, Rich, Democratic countries


Qualitative
Publications using qualitative research methods


Quantitative
Publications using quantitative research methods







Select Countries ‚Äî Use the grouped dropdown to choose countries by region
Select Metric ‚Äî Choose which publication metric to display
Filter Decades ‚Äî Use the slider to filter the starting decade
Global Average ‚Äî Toggle the switch to show/hide the global benchmark





Data is simulated for demonstration purposes
Real data would come from bibliometric databases like Web of Science or Scopus
WEIRD = Western, Educated, Industrialized, Rich, Democratic (Henrich et al., 2010)




This dashboard showcases the improved dashboardr input system:

Grouped select options ‚Äî Countries organized by region
Slider with custom labels ‚Äî Decade labels instead of numbers
Toggle series switch ‚Äî Show/hide specific series with override
Help text ‚Äî Contextual guidance for each input
Metric switching ‚Äî Dynamic data updates based on selection
